summary: Adds the Ring of Khajiit Artifact.
descriptionHtml:
Was digging through Skyrim\'s BSA\'s and noticed there are meshes and textures for the Ring of Khajiit, but I wasn\'t able to find any indication that they were implemented in game, so I decided to use what they started and implemented it. Unfortunately, Chameleon, fortify speed, and the ability to cast invisibility through a ring granting the ability seem absent in this game unlike the previous, so the enchantments were altered but hopefully retain the core aspect of the ring.


There are 4 files, one with stamina regeneration enchantment, one without, and a craftable version of each.

Non-craftable version can be found in a chest belonging to a certain rare item collector and murderer. There are two chests in his house, the locked chest on the second floor/attic contains it.

The craftable version is found at the forge under Jewelery with no perk requirement.



Installation: Extract file to Skyrim/Data. Access Data Files on the Skyrim launcher and make sure \"RingOfKhajiit.esp\" has a checked box next to it. Also have \"LoadLooseFiles\" checked on the same window. 



If I looked over this already being available in game please let me know.
author: BartokTB
